text.more:
Graph analysis:
1) The Scientology Web looks like an intranet: there is no outbound link pointing at Mainstream Web like Youtube, etc.
2) The nodes have an extremely high degree : usually for this kind of website sample, the entity with the highest degree is Youtube and isn't pointed by 90% of the websites.
3) There is a very high density which created this round shape.
4) There are two poles: a religious one(scientology.org,...) and a cultural one(Dianetics.org,...)
5) The further a website is from the center, the more local the entity is(Scientologi.se, Scientology-Detroit.org,...)
6) There are just few french nodes and their degrees are extremely low.
text.intro: Thanks to the graph below, we see an occupation of Web territory very well thought by Church of Scientology. To create this graph, I just needed to crawl from scientology.org (with a fixed maximum depth). No data cleaning has been done.
text.title: Graph on Scientology Web
